I don't see a paste anywhere.
I am fairly certain that you need to add _netdev to the options like: _netdev,rw,hard,intr
that tells the system that you need networking first to mount that device
never had to do so.. is this an ubuntu modification?

I don't really know, but I've had to do it on my machines. I guess the kernel will normally try to mount devices before making network connections, or do them in parallel, so with that option it forces it to wait for networking to complete before attempting to mount
